lead_paragraph: The Times's recent coverage of pop stars past and present has included features on Keith Richards and Taylor Swift, a review of a book about Frank Sinatra, and a slide show about some current female teen idols and their changing images. Who are your favorite current pop music stars? What pop idols from the past fascinate you? Why? What about their public images do you find most interesting?
snippet: Student Opinion | Tell us about the pop music stars, past or present, that most interest you. What about their public images do you think is so compelling?

headline.main: Which Pop Music Stars Fascinate You?

abstract: Student Opinion | Tell us about the pop music stars, past or present, that most interest you. What about their public images do you think is so compelling?
